thread.title: Juan

author: Juan
title: Juan
text: Ordered a Methley plum. First time ordering a tree online, so I was not sure what the experience would be. The tree arrived more quickly than expected (I think it was just a few days). It was well packaged in a box, bubble wrap, and root system protected with moisture. There were clear instructions included with the tree. It has been in the ground for only a few days, so I cannot yet comment on long-term health.
